sadness.quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us
sadness.author: Helen Keller

sadness.quote: People who love you and care for you will be present and ready, when you are
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: The antidote to misery is to stay present
sadness.author: Pema Chödrön

sadness.quote: In life, obstacles are needed for us to grow. Problems occur not to us but for us
sadness.author: Haemin Sunim

sadness.quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief
sadness.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

sadness.quote: Grief is a normal and natural response to loss. It is originally an unlearned feeling process. Keeping grief inside increases your pain
sadness.author: Anne Grant

sadness.quote: Grief is like the ocean; it comes on waves ebbing and flowing. Sometimes the water is calm, and sometimes it is overwhelming. All we can do is learn to swim
sadness.author: Vicki Harrison

sadness.quote: Being silly is important. It’s the opposite of grief. It’s throwing yourself into a moment without care. You can’t always maintain status as a dignified person – it gives you blinders. When you always expect the world to fulfill your expectations, it wears you down. It closes you off
sadness.author: Stephen Colbert

sadness.quote: Grief is a step towards strength because it allows you to be porous and take everything in, and have it transform you. What will sit within you is despairing, but at least it’s feeling. You’re not numb. Grief is sort of the allowance of feeling
sadness.author: Carrie Brownstein

sadness.quote: Before a new chapter is begun, the old one has to be finished
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: Grief… happens upon you, it’s bigger than you. There is a humility that you have to step into, where you surrender to being moved through the landscape of grief by grief itself. And it has its own timeframe, it has its own itinerary with you, it has its own power over you, and it will come when it comes. And when it comes, it’s a bow-down. It’s a carve-out. And it comes when it wants to, and it carves you out — it comes in the middle of the night, comes in the middle of the day, comes in the middle of a meeting, comes in the middle of a meal. It arrives — it’s this tremendously forceful arrival and it cannot be resisted without you suffering more… The posture that you take is you hit your knees in absolute humility and you let it rock you until it is done with you. And it will be done with you, eventually. And when it is done, it will leave. But to stiffen, to resist, and to fight it is to hurt yourself
sadness.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

sadness.quote: People who love you and care for you will be present and ready, when you are
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Ain’t no shame in holding on to grief, as long as you make room for other things too
sadness.author: Reginald ‘Bubbles’ Cousins

sadness.quote: Wisdom lies in cheerful acceptance of whatever life throws at you. Easier said than done, I know. But what is the alternative? If you cannot change something, it is best to accept it cheerfully rather than adding to one’s misfortune by grieving over it
sadness.author: Either change or accept! @TheAncientSage

sadness.quote: Give yourself space and permission to feel, to grieve, to speak truth, to be speechless, to let go, to hold tightly, to mobilize, to be still, to be where you are. Your process doesn’t have to match anyone else’s in content or in time
sadness.author: Thema Bryant-Davis (See also: love yourself quotes)

sadness.quote: Healing from trauma is not an intellectual exercise. You cannot simply think your way out of it. Your healing requires your full participation: spirit, heart, mind, and body
sadness.author: Thema Bryant-Davis

sadness.quote: To offer no resistance to life is to be in a state of grace, ease and lightness. This state is then no longer dependent upon things being in a certain way, good or bad
sadness.author: Eckhart Tolle

sadness.quote: The good news: it is possible to use suffering as a call for wider awakening in the world
sadness.author: Eckhart Tolle

sadness.quote: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine
sadness.author: Thomas Aquinas

sadness.quote: We should feel sorrow, but not sink under its oppression
sadness.author: Confucius

sadness.quote: To heal a wound, you must stop scratching it
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: Be gentle with yourself: You are doing the best you can
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: It took me years to see the gift. And that was the greatest one
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Joy lives concealed in grief
sadness.author: Rumi

sadness.quote: When grief is deepest, words are fewest
sadness.author: Ann Voskamp

sadness.quote: Grief is a gift, something you have to earn
sadness.author: Peter Høeg

sadness.quote: Grief is the price we pay for being close to one another. If we want to avoid our grief, we simply avoid each other
sadness.author: Thomas Lynch

sadness.quote: Amor fati is about loving what happens and making use of it
sadness.author: Unknown (See also: What Is "Amor Fati" (A Love of Fate), 1 minute YouTube video)

sadness.quote: Feelings, and feelings, and feelings. Let me try thinking instead. C.S
sadness.author: Lewis (A Grief Observed)

sadness.quote: All your sorrows have been wasted on you if you have not yet learned how to be wretched
sadness.author: Seneca

sadness.quote: When grief comes to visit me, it’s like being visited by a tsunami. I am given just enough warning to say, "Oh my god, this is happening right now," and then I drop to the floor on my knees and let it rock me. How do you survive the tsunami of grief? By being willing to experience it, without resistance
sadness.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

sadness.quote: A man lifting his head from the very funeral pyre must need some novel vocabulary not drawn from ordinary everyday condolence to comfort his own dear ones. But every great and overpowering grief must take away the capacity to choose words, since it often stifles the voice itself
sadness.author: Seneca

sadness.quote: Which one of you ever dared to think about exile, about poverty, about grief?
sadness.author: Seneca

sadness.quote: Accepting a situation is not a voluntary response. You either understand that something cannot be changed, or you do not
sadness.author: James Pierce

sadness.quote: Our sorrows provide us with the lesson we most need to learn
sadness.author: Lama Surya Das

sadness.quote: Don’t confuse your grief with guilt
sadness.author: Veronica Roth

sadness.quote: Given the choice between the experience of pain and nothing, I would choose pain
sadness.author: William Faulkner

sadness.quote: The shadow is the greatest teacher for how to come to the light
sadness.author: Ram Dass

sadness.quote: Life and death are a package deal. You cannot pull them apart
sadness.author: Frank Ostaseski

sadness.quote: Our soul is governed by four invisible forces: love, death, power and time
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: The world is afflicted by death and decay. But the wise do not grieve, having realized the nature of the world
sadness.author: Buddha

sadness.quote: Avoid lies so you can see reality. Fools seek distractions. The wise sit, wait and try to understand
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Grief is natural; the absence of all feeling is undesirable, but moderation in grief should be observed, as in the face of all good or evil
sadness.author: Plutarch

sadness.quote: The universe is made up of experiences that are designed to burn out our reactivity, which is our attachment, our clinging, to pain, to pleasure, to fear, to all of it
sadness.author: Ram Dass

sadness.quote: Inside us there lie a mountain of fear and a deep river of grief. But there is also the compassionate eye witnessing your inner landscape
sadness.author: Haemin Sunim

sadness.quote: It is better to conquer our grief than to deceive it. For if it has withdrawn, being merely beguiled by pleasures and preoccupations, it starts up again and from its very respite gains force to savage us. But the grief that has been conquered by reason is calmed for ever. I am not therefore going to prescribe for you those remedies which I know many people have used, that you divert or cheer yourself by a long or pleasant journey abroad, or spend a lot of time carefully going through your accounts and administering your estate, or constantly be involved in some new activity. All those things help only for a short time; they do not cure grief but hinder it. But I would rather end it than distract it. Seneca (See also: Seneca on Grief and the Key to Resilience in the Face of Loss, brainpickings
sadness.author: org)

sadness.quote: Death will take everything away. Think about that. Everything you’ve accumulated, fought for, worried over, everything will go. Why not let it all go now when you’re still living. Renounce it mentally. Then you can live freely and fearlessly because you’ve nothing to lose
sadness.author: @TheAncientSage

sadness.quote: Only intense self-awareness can eradicate the cause of sorrow
sadness.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

sadness.quote: A fountain gets muddy with but little stirring up, and does not get clear by our meddling with it but by our leaving it alone. The best remedy for disturbances is to let them run their course, for so they quiet down
sadness.author: Baltasar Gracián

sadness.quote: Everyone we cherish will, someday, get sick and die. If we do not practice the meditation on emptiness, when those things happen, we will be overwhelmed. Concentration on emptiness is a way of staying in touch with life as it is, but it has to be practiced, not just talked about
sadness.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

sadness.quote: Buddha’s doctrine: man suffers because of his craving to possess and keep forever things which are impermanent
sadness.author: Alan Watts

sadness.quote: First, see clearly. Next, act correctly. Finally, endure and accept the world as it is
sadness.author: Ryan Holiday (See also: stoic quotes)

sadness.quote: The fates guide the person who accepts them and hinder the person who resists them
sadness.author: Cleanthes

sadness.quote: Abandon yesterday, tomorrow and today. Cross over to the farthest shore beyond life and death
sadness.author: Buddhist proverb

sadness.quote: Life is not opposed to death nor is death a darkening of life
sadness.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

sadness.quote: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides
sadness.author: Taoist proverb

sadness.quote: Part 1. Grief is a full-body experience. It takes over your entire body — it’s not a disease of the mind. It’s something that impacts you at the physical level
sadness.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

sadness.quote: Part 2. I feel that it has a tremendous relationship to love: First of all, as they say, it’s the price you pay for love. But, secondly, in the moments of my life when I have fallen in love, I have just as little power over it as I do in grief
sadness.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

sadness.quote: Part 3. There are certain things that happen to you as a human being that you cannot control or command, that will come to you at really inconvenient times, and where you have to bow in the human humility to the fact that there’s something running through you that’s bigger than you
sadness.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

sadness.quote: It’s easy to stand in the crowd but it takes courage to stand alone
sadness.author: Mahatma Gandhi

sadness.quote: Loneliness is not lack of company, loneliness is lack of purpose
sadness.author: Guillermo Maldonado

sadness.quote: The woman who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The woman who walks alone is likely to find herself in places no one has ever been before
sadness.author: Albert Einstein

sadness.quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better
sadness.author: Henry Rollins

sadness.quote: The thing that makes you exceptional, if you are at all, is inevitably that which makes you lonely
sadness.author: Lorraine Hansberry

sadness.quote: Time spent undistracted and alone, in self-examination, journaling, meditation, resolves the unresolved and takes us from mentally fat to fit
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: When they are alone they want to be with others, and when they are with others they want to be alone. After all, human beings are like that
sadness.author: Gertrude Stein

sadness.quote: The price of being a sheep is boredom. The price of being a wolf is loneliness. Choose one or the other with great care
sadness.author: Hugh MacLeod

sadness.quote: Ordinary men hate solitude. But the master makes use of it, embracing his aloneness, realizing he is one with the whole universe
sadness.author: Lao Tzu

sadness.quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself
sadness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sadness.quote: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self
sadness.author: Mary Sarton

sadness.quote: Feeling lonely is fine. Staying this way forever is not
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: The loneliness you feel is actually an opportunity to reconnect with others and yourself
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: If you are never alone, you cannot know yourself
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: There is nothing outside of yourself, look within. Everything you want is there – you are That
sadness.author: Rumi

sadness.quote: By all means use sometimes to be alone. Salute thyself; see what thy soul doth wear
sadness.author: George Herbert

sadness.quote: We feel alone, and in this we are connected
sadness.author: Leo Babauta

sadness.quote: Every single human being who is alive has felt this kind of pain, hopelessness, and loneliness at one time or another. We are all connected through this shared pain and struggle
sadness.author: Leo Babauta

sadness.quote: Our great depression is our lives. We’ve all been raised on television to believe that one day we’d all be millionaires, and movie gods, and rock stars, but we won’t. We’re slowly learning that fact. And we’re very, very pissed off
sadness.author: Tyler Durden Fight Club)

sadness.quote: The worst part of holding the memories is not the pain. It’s the loneliness of it. Memories need to be shared
sadness.author: Lois Lowry

sadness.quote: If you look to others for fulfillment, you will never truly be fulfilled
sadness.author: Lao Tzu

sadness.quote: Remember never to say that you are alone, for you are not alone; nay, God is within, and your genius is within
sadness.author: Epictetus

sadness.quote: Rise to the level of your ideals, not the average of your environment
sadness.author: @TheStoicEmperor

sadness.quote: Lonely is not being alone, it’s the feeling that no one cares
sadness.author: Unknown

sadness.quote: What a lovely surprise to discover how unlonely being alone can be
sadness.author: Ellen Burstyn

sadness.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you’re alone with
sadness.author: Wayne Dyer

sadness.quote: If you are afraid of being lonely, don’t try to be right
sadness.author: Jules Renard

sadness.quote: I don’t mind being alone. I just don’t want to be part of the crowd
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: The reality is life is a single-player game. You’re born alone. You’re going to die alone. All of your interpretations are alone. All your memories are alone. You’re gone in three generations and nobody cares. Before you showed up, nobody cared. It’s all single-player
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: We feel guilt when we no longer want to associate with old friends and colleagues who haven’t changed. The price, and marker, of growth
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Part 1. We’re used to constantly judging things. The act of judging something separates you from that thing
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Part 2. Over time, as you judge, judge, judge, you invariably judge people. You judge yourself. You separate yourself from everything, and then you end up lonely
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Part 3. That feeling of disconnection, loneliness, is eventually what leads to suffering
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Be strong enough to stand alone, smart enough to know when you need help, and brave enough to ask for it
sadness.author: Tim Fargo

sadness.quote: He who’s mind is not steady does not find happiness either amongst the people or in the solitude of the forest. When alone, he longs for company, and when in company, he longs for solitude
sadness.author: Chanakya

sadness.quote: Although I am a typical loner in my daily life, my awareness of belonging to the invisible community of those who strive for truth, beauty, and justice has prevented me from feelings of isolation
sadness.author: Albert Einstein

sadness.quote: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, however measured or far away
sadness.author: Henry David Thoreau

sadness.quote: We don’t need sugar, flour or rice or anything else. We just want to see our dear ones
sadness.author: Hafiz of Persia (Hafez)

sadness.quote: Inside myself is a place where I live all alone, and that’s where I renew my springs that never dry up
sadness.author: Pearl Buck

sadness.quote: A lonely day is God’s way of saying that he wants to spend some quality time with you
sadness.author: Criss Jami

sadness.quote: The crowds poison, too much time and you end up like them. Retreat to yourself. The only safe place
sadness.author: Crypto Seneca

sadness.quote: All of humanity’s problems stem from man’s inability to sit quietly in a room alone
sadness.author: Blaise Pascal

sadness.quote: It is strange to be known so universally and yet to be so lonely
sadness.author: Albert Einstein

sadness.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path
sadness.author: Buddha

sadness.quote: I want to be with those who know secret things or else alone
sadness.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

sadness.quote: I used to think the worst thing in life was to end up alone. It’s not. The worst thing in life is to end up with people that make you feel alone
sadness.author: Robin Williams

sadness.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty
sadness.author: Mother Teresa

sadness.quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power
sadness.author: Lao Tzu

sadness.quote: Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you
sadness.author: Lao Tzu

sadness.quote: What the superior man seeks is in himself; what the small man seeks is in others
sadness.author: Confucius

sadness.quote: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness
sadness.author: Maya Angelou

sadness.quote: I love to be alone. I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude
sadness.author: Henry David Thoreau

sadness.quote: A great fire burns within me, but no one stops to warm themselves at it, and passers-by only see a wisp of smoke
sadness.author: Vincent Van Gogh

sadness.quote: Sometimes it is necessary to be lonely in order to prove that you are right
sadness.author: Vladimir Putin

sadness.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail
sadness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sadness.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment
sadness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sadness.quote: I came alone in this world, I have walked alone in the valley of the shadow of death, and I shall quit alone when the time comes
sadness.author: Mahatma Gandhi

sadness.quote: Love and compassion open our own inner life, reducing stress, distrust and loneliness
sadness.author: 14th Dalai Lama

sadness.quote: I restore myself when I’m alone
sadness.author: Marilyn Monroe

sadness.quote: I don’t want to be alone. I want to be left alone
sadness.author: Audrey Hepburn

sadness.quote: The worst loneliness is to not be comfortable with yourself
sadness.author: Mark Twain

sadness.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to reform (or pause and reflect)
sadness.author: Mark Twain

sadness.quote: Only the self-sufficient stand alone – most people follow the crowd and imitate
sadness.author: Bruce Lee

sadness.quote: I am here for you
sadness.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

sadness.quote: You are not alone. Trust me
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: I’m a lion in a strange land
sadness.author: Criss Jami

sadness.quote: Where’s your will to be weird?
sadness.author: Jim Morrison

sadness.quote: I became strong because I was lonely
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: This task is yours and yours alone
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Solitude vivifies; isolation kills
sadness.author: Joseph Roux

sadness.quote: I might be alone, but I’m never lonely
sadness.author: Megan Hart

sadness.quote: Loneliness is one thing, solitude another
sadness.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

sadness.quote: A man thinking or working is always alone
sadness.author: Henry David Thoreau

sadness.quote: Large groups are no place for smart people
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Where will you find the virtuous man? Alone
sadness.author: @TheStoicEmperor

sadness.quote: I like to be alone, but I hate being lonely
sadness.author: Unknown

sadness.quote: What loneliness is more lonely than distrust?
sadness.author: George Eliot

sadness.quote: If one’s different, one’s bound to be lonely
sadness.author: Aldous Huxley

sadness.quote: If you can’t live alone, you were born a slave
sadness.author: Fernando Pessoa

sadness.quote: Chance never helps those who do not help themselves
sadness.author: Sophocles

sadness.quote: Don’t feel lonely, the entire universe is inside you
sadness.author: Rumi

sadness.quote: Because he accepts himself, the whole world accepts him
sadness.author: Lao Tzu

sadness.quote: Loneliness, when accepted, is a gift that will lead us to find a purpose in life
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live
sadness.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

sadness.quote: All great and precious things are lonely
sadness.author: John Steinbeck

sadness.quote: As soon as I realized happiness was internal and that I was the only one responsible for it, I stopped feeling lonely
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: I wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being
sadness.author: Hafiz of Persia (Hafez)

sadness.quote: I owe everything that I have done to the fact that I am very much at ease being alone
sadness.author: Marilynne Robinson

sadness.quote: Know that even if you feel alone, you are not alone. I, for one, am connected to you because I’m thinking of you, all of you. I’m connected to you because I too have suffered in similar ways. We have shared pain, shared hopelessness, shared loneliness. Leo Babauta (See also: To Those Who Are Struggling, zenhabits
sadness.author: net)

sadness.quote: I can’t take away your pain, but I can offer you two miracles: the love that comes from turning toward other human beings, and the connection we have to everyone on Earth
sadness.author: Leo Babauta

sadness.quote: What I must do is all that concerns me, not what the people think. This rule, equally arduous in actual and intellectual life, may serve for the whole distinction between greatness and meanness. It is the harder, because you will always find those who think they know what is your duty better than you know it. It is easy in the world to live after the world’s opinion; it is easy in solitude to live after our own; but the great person is one who in the midst of the crowd keeps with perfect sweetness the independence of solitude
sadness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sadness.quote: Is it so bad then to be misunderstood? Pythagoras was misunderstood, and Socrates, and Jesus, and Luther, and Copernicus, and Galileo, and Newton, and every pure and wise spirit that ever took flesh. To be great is to be misunderstood
sadness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sadness.quote: Be yourself; no base imitator of another, but your best self. There is something which you can do better than another. Listen to the inward voice and bravely obey that. Do the things at which you are great, not what you were never made for
sadness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sadness.quote: If you go deeper and deeper into your own heart, you’ll be living in a world with less fear, isolation and loneliness
sadness.author: Sharon Salzberg

sadness.quote: The ultimate power in life is to be completely self-reliant, completely yourself
sadness.author: Robert Greene

sadness.quote: I prefer winter and fall, when you feel the bone structure of the landscape – the loneliness of it, the dead feeling of winter. Something waits beneath it, the whole story doesn’t show
sadness.author: Andrew Wyeth

sadness.quote: I am completely a loner. In my head I want to feel I can be anywhere. There is a sort of recklessness that being a loner allows me
sadness.author: Arundhati Roy

sadness.quote: It’s ok to feel lonely sometimes. We are human and to feel is to live. Loneliness is a feeling just like any other; happiness, joy etc
sadness.author: If we don’t feel lonely sometimes, how would we feel when we are happy and joyous? The Happy Philosopher

sadness.quote: It is not easy to be a person of high standards; you have to pay for it. It does, however, make you stand out from the crowd, which alone makes it worth more than its price
sadness.author: @TheAncientSage

sadness.quote: If you want to be in the top 1% of a particular domain, then you can’t take your cues from and follow the social norms of 99% of people. This is harder than it sounds. We are wired to imitate. The further you want to climb, the more carefully you need to construct your tribe
sadness.author: James Clear

sadness.quote: Work in silence. It is the silent work the work done in solitude done purely in principle and conviction driven by a force of purpose that separates men
sadness.author: Max Panzer

sadness.quote: I am thankful to all those who said no. It’s because of them, I did it myself
sadness.author: Wayne Dyer

sadness.quote: Nothing can dim the light that shines from within
sadness.author: Maya Angelou

sadness.quote: Great spirits have always found violent opposition from mediocrities
sadness.author: Albert Einstein

sadness.quote: You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone
sadness.author: Amit Ray

sadness.quote: Either give me more wine or leave me alone
sadness.author: Rumi

sadness.quote: There is a guy in the coffee shop sitting alone and drinking coffee like a crazy person. No phone. No laptop. No smart watch. No book. Just coffee. Alone with his thoughts
sadness.author: Shane Parrish

sadness.quote: To be successful, one has to be one of three bees – the queen bee, the hardest working bee, or the bee that does not fit in
sadness.author: Suzy Kassem

sadness.quote: Yes, I guess you could say I am a loner, but I feel more lonely in a crowded room with boring people that I feel on my own
sadness.author: Henry Rollins

sadness.quote: Solitude is fine but you need someone to tell that solitude is fine
sadness.author: Honoré de Balzac

sadness.quote: The irony of loneliness is we all feel it at the same time — together
sadness.author: Rupi Kaur

sadness.quote: So you’re a little weird? Work it! A little different? Own it! Better to be a nerd than one of the herd!
sadness.author: Mandy Hale

sadness.quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone
sadness.author: Anthony Burgess

sadness.quote: Sometimes a scream is better than a thesis
sadness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sadness.quote: Solitude can be tolerated only up to a certain limit, you know
sadness.author: Albert Einstein

sadness.quote: I am a real lone wolf who has never wholeheartedly belonged to the State, to my country, my circle of friends and not even to my family but who, despite all these bonds, has constantly experienced a feeling of strangeness and the need for solitude
sadness.author: Albert Einstein

sadness.quote: I’m so scared of dying without ever being really seen
sadness.author: Can you understand? David Foster Wallace

sadness.quote: We’re all lonely for something we don’t know we’re lonely for
sadness.author: How else to explain the curious feeling that goes around feeling like missing somebody we’ve never even met? David Foster Wallace

sadness.quote: After 10 years of depression and loneliness, I realized the person I missed the most was not another, but myself
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Human beings can’t bear silence. It would mean that they would bear themselves
sadness.author: Pascal Mercier

sadness.quote: We’re all islands shouting lies to each other across seas of misunderstanding
sadness.author: Rudyard Kipling

sadness.quote: No one has ever properly understood me, I have never fully understood anyone; and no one understands anyone else
sadness.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

sadness.quote: It is not up to others to protect or help you. You are on your own
sadness.author: Robert Greene

sadness.quote: No one is really going to help you or give you direction
sadness.author: Robert Greene

sadness.quote: We must all die alone, which really means, that our pain is for us alone to endure. Others can throw us words of encouragement, but in every life, we are out on the ocean drowning in the swell and others, even the nice ones, are standing on the shore, waving cheerily
sadness.author: Alain de Botton

sadness.quote: Loneliness is the longing for connection
sadness.author: The Happy Philosopher

sadness.quote: To feel lonely is to join the rest of humanity in acknowledging the painful reality that we are somehow fundamentally separated from each other, never to be fully understood
sadness.author: The Happy Philosopher

sadness.quote: The modern struggle – Lone individuals summoning inhuman willpower, fasting, meditating, and exercising, up against armies of scientists and statisticians weaponizing abundant food, screens, and medicine into junk food, clickbait news, infinite porn, endless games and addictive drugs
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Reality is neutral. Our reactions reflect back and create our world. Judge, and feel separate and lonely. Anger, and lose peace of mind. Cling, and live in anxiety. Fantasize, and miss the present. Desire, and suffer until you have it. Heaven and hell are right here, right now
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: It is better for an exceptional individual to be alone (and in the company of great men of the past and present through their books, etc) than to be in the mediocrizing influence of those around him. A genius is nourished by his solitary rebellion against the ways of society
sadness.author: @TheAncientSage

sadness.quote: Every man alone is sincere. At the entrance of a second person, hypocrisy begins
sadness.author: Patrick OShaughnessy

sadness.quote: The person who tries to live alone will not succeed as a human being. His heart withers if it does not answer another heart. His mind shrinks away if he hears only the echoes of his own thoughts and finds no other inspiration. Pearl S
sadness.author: Buck

sadness.quote: You evolved to hunt and fight and create and connect. Not sit at home and watch TV and cram pizza into your intestines all the damn time. No wonder you feel sad, lonely, and depressed – in fact, it would be surprising if you didn’t
sadness.author: Life Math Money

sadness.quote: Most people keep eating not because they’re hungry, but because they’re bored
sadness.author: Life Math Money

sadness.quote: A man is born alone and dies alone, and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone, and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode
sadness.author: Chanakya

sadness.quote: If you want to live a miserable life, then blame everyone for your problems and never take responsibility for anything
sadness.author: Thibaut

sadness.quote: Don’t live in a manner that makes you despise being alone with yourself
sadness.author: @TheStoicEmperor

sadness.quote: People fear the places the undistracted mind might wander too. Much of what people describe as boredom is in fact a fear of stillness. Distraction lets us fill our minds with other voices so we don’t have to listen to the inner voice that whispers truths we fear to confront
sadness.author: @TheStoicEmperor

sadness.quote: If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him
sadness.author: Criss Jami

sadness.quote: Isn’t it funny that at Christmas something in you gets so lonely for – I don’t know what exactly, but it’s something that you don’t mind so much not having at other times. Kate L
sadness.author: Bosher

sadness.quote: The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly. F
sadness.author: Scott Fitzgerald

sadness.quote: Being alone never felt right. Sometimes it felt good, but it never felt right
sadness.author: Charles Bukowski

sadness.quote: The price for independence is often isolation and solitude
sadness.author: Steve Schmidt

sadness.quote: To find yourself, think for yourself
sadness.author: Socrates

sadness.quote: Loneliness is a tax we have to pay to atone for a certain complexity of mind
sadness.author: Alain de Botton

sadness.quote: A high degree of loneliness is an inexorable part of being a sensitive and intelligent human. It’s a built-in feature of a complex existence
sadness.author: Alain de Botton

sadness.quote: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together
sadness.author: Shane Parrish

sadness.quote: Loneliness is a sign you are in desperate need of yourself
sadness.author: Rupi Kaur

sadness.quote: Loneliness is cured by contact with yourself
sadness.author: Sven Schnieders

sadness.quote: Boredom is a defense mechanism to avoid having to sit alone with our unaddressed thoughts
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: If you can only learn from people that you 100% agree with on everything, it’s going to be a dark and lonely life
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: In the long run, every pain is a gift
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Alternate between the solitary and the social. Whether alone or with others, keep serenity
sadness.author: Deng Ming-Dao

sadness.quote: It is the barren silence of winter that makes the birdsong and blossoms of spring so enchanting. Leisure after labor. Company after solitude. Home after a voyage. Contrasts reveal the nature of things. The world is always in flux. Appreciate the season while it lasts
sadness.author: @TheStoicEmperor

sadness.quote: Part 1. The wisdom of our language has grasped these two sides of a man’s being alone. It has created the word loneliness in order to emphasize the pain of being alone, and it has created the word solitude in order to emphasize the glory of being alone. In daily life, these words are not always distinguished; but we should do it consistently, thus deepening by these very words the understanding of our human predicament
sadness.author: Paul Tillich

sadness.quote: Part 2. Loneliness can be conquered alone by those who can bear solitude. Let us dare to have solitude — to face the eternal, to find others, to see ourselves
sadness.author: Paul Tillich

sadness.quote: The best way to get approval is not to need it
sadness.author: Hugh MacLeod

sadness.quote: Part 1. Modern society gives us incredible flexibility in that we can get away from our crazy family members, and we’re not destined to die where we were born or do what our parents did. So we have incredible freedom
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Part 2. But then coming with it is this tremendous loneliness that we try and cover up either through drugs or alcohol, or partying, even trying to find a mission like putting people on Mars. But the reality is a lot of that loneliness just comes from being disconnected from growing up with your tribal environment
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Your thought is easily influenced by the presence of another soul; a person can be completely free only when he is alone
sadness.author: Leo Tolstoy (A Calendar of Wisdom, Amazon book)

sadness.quote: The only way to survive is to admit you are on your own, learn to make your own decisions, and trust your judgement
sadness.author: Robert Greene

sadness.quote: When you’re alone, watch your thoughts. When you’re successful, watch your ego. When you’ve got problems, watch your emotions. When you’re with the crowds, watch what you say
sadness.author: Crypto Seneca

sadness.quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist
sadness.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

sadness.quote: What is needed is this, and this alone: solitude, great inner loneliness. Going into oneself and not meeting anyone for hours – that is what one must arrive at
sadness.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

sadness.quote: It is good to be solitary, for solitude is difficult; that something is difficult must be a reason the more for us to do it
sadness.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

sadness.quote: The whole conviction of my life now rests upon the belief that loneliness, far from being a rare and curious phenomenon, peculiar to myself and to a few other solitary men, is the central and inevitable fact of human existence. When we examine the moments, acts, and statements of all kinds of people — not only the grief and ecstasy of the greatest poets, but also the huge unhappiness of the average soul…we find, I think, that they are all suffering from the same thing. The final cause of their complaint is loneliness
sadness.author: Thomas Wolfe

sadness.quote: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence
sadness.author: Eric Fromm

sadness.quote: There are times when explanations, no matter how reasonable, just don’t seem to help
sadness.author: Fred Rogers

sadness.quote: There is no person in this whole world who is a mistake, no matter how different that person may seem
sadness.author: Fred Rogers

sadness.quote: You are strong. You are beautiful. You are resilient. You are loved. You are capable. You are not weak. You are not defected. You are not weird. You are not a lost cause. You are not different. The Anxiety Man (@RealAnxietyMan on twitter
sadness.author: com)

sadness.quote: It is easy to be heavy: hard to be light. G.K
sadness.author: Chesterton

sadness.quote: No darkness lasts forever. And even there, there are stars. Ursula K
sadness.author: Le Guin (The Farthest Shore)

sadness.quote: We know you’re tired, tired and scared. Happens to everyone, okay? Just don’t let your feet stop
sadness.author: Haruki Murakami

sadness.quote: A depressing and difficult passage has prefaced every page I have turned in life
sadness.author: Charlotte Brontë

sadness.quote: Depression lies. It tells you you’ve always felt this way, and you always will. But you haven’t, and you won’t
sadness.author: Halley Cornell

sadness.quote: No storm, not even the one in your life, can last forever. The storm is just passing over
sadness.author: Iyanla Vanzant

sadness.quote: The more you see and accept reality, the more you’ll understand and love yourself
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: There are some things about myself I can’t explain to anyone. There are some things I don’t understand at all
sadness.author: Haruki Murakami

sadness.quote: Depression is, in part, grief for your own life not turning out how it should; grief for your own needs not being met
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: Love your future more than your past
sadness.author: Joe Dispenza

sadness.quote: The shadows are as important as the light
sadness.author: Charlotte Brontë

sadness.quote: Winter always comes to an end, always
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Life begins on the other side of despair
sadness.author: Jean-Paul Sartre (Nausea)

sadness.quote: You can’t stay in your corner of the forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes
sadness.author: Winnie the Pooh

sadness.quote: Sometimes, when I say "I am ok", I want someone to hold me tight, look me in the eyes and say "No, I know you are not"
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho (Hippie)

sadness.quote: There is no normal life that is free of pain. It’s the very wrestling with our problems that can be the impetus for our growth
sadness.author: Fred Rogers

sadness.quote: Going through anxiety or depression or any other psychological condition doesn’t make you unlovable – it makes you human. Seth J. Gillihan (See also: Yes, You Are Lovable With Depression and Anxiety, webmd
sadness.author: com)

sadness.quote: Never lose hope. This life is worth the struggle. Your future self is pleading with you to stay. You are more than your thoughts. You are more than your fears and stronger than you give yourself credit for
sadness.author: The Anxiety Man (@RealAnxietyMan)

sadness.quote: If you are depressed and anxious, the main thing I want to tell you is: your pain makes sense. It has meaning. You aren’t a machine with broken parts. You are a human being with unmet needs. Don’t let anyone tell you you’re crazy or broken. You deserve love and practical support
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: Being deluded and scared will make you suffocate. Being honest with yourself and responsible will make you breathe
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: There will always be suffering. But we must not suffer over the suffering
sadness.author: Alan Watts

sadness.quote: All obstacles that are perceived with love can transform into the greatest life lessons
sadness.author: Gabby Bernstein

sadness.quote: It isn’t that they can’t see the solution. It is that they can’t see the problem. G.K
sadness.author: Chesterton

sadness.quote: The fundamental delusion – there is something out there that will make me happy and fulfilled forever
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: Whereas pain is a physical experience, suffering is a mental one. It is the sense that things should be other than they are. Its antidote is acceptance
sadness.author: Wu Hsin

sadness.quote: And once the storm is over, you won’t remember how you made it through, how you managed to survive. You won’t even be sure, whether the storm is really over. But one thing is certain. When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in
sadness.author: Haruki Murakami

sadness.quote: The wound is the place where the light enters you
sadness.author: Rumi

sadness.quote: We cannot simply sit and stare at our wounds forever. We must stand up and move on to the next action
sadness.author: Haruki Murakami (1Q84)

sadness.quote: It is in dialogue with pain that many beautiful things acquire their value
sadness.author: Alain de Botton (The Architecture of Happiness)

sadness.quote: There are moments when troubles enter our lives and we can do nothing to avoid them. But they are there for a reason. Only when we have overcome them we will understand why they were there
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: You know quite well, deep within you, that there is only a single magic, a single power, a single salvation…and that is called loving. Well, then, love your suffering. Do not resist it, do not flee from it. It is your aversion that hurts, nothing else
sadness.author: Hermann Hesse

sadness.quote: Don’t cling to yesterday. It was beautiful, but it was yesterday
sadness.author: Osho

sadness.quote: Depression is a kind of constricted consciousness
sadness.author: Bill Richards

sadness.quote: Depression isn’t a disease; depression is a normal response to abnormal life experiences
sadness.author: Johann Hari (Lost Connections)

sadness.quote: The opposite of play is not work – the opposite of play is depression
sadness.author: Stuart Brown

sadness.quote: What people think causes depression: being weak, being lazy, choosing to think negative. What actually causes depression: a loved one dying, trauma, bullying, low self-esteem, body image issues, financial struggles, genetic factors. Mental Health Notes (@depressionnote on twitter
sadness.author: com)

sadness.quote: Depression is a medical condition. We need to create a world where people are as comfortable seeking care for their minds as they are for their bodies
sadness.author: Adam Grant

sadness.quote: Depression is being colorblind and constantly told how colorful the world is
sadness.author: Atticus

sadness.quote: Depressed means you need deep rest from the character you’ve been playing in the world
sadness.author: Jim Carrey

sadness.quote: Make peace with your past so it won’t destroy your present
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho (Hippie)

sadness.quote: Step out of the history that is holding you back. Step into the new story you are willing to create
sadness.author: Oprah Winfrey

sadness.quote: With depression, one of the most important things you could realize is that you’re not alone
sadness.author: Dwayne Johnson (The Rock)

sadness.quote: Real change will come about not as a result of prayer, but of using intelligence and taking action
sadness.author: 14th Dalai Lama

sadness.quote: I have never felt so much pain in my life. It was tough for me to even get out of bed and I had days when I couldn’t walk, let alone write a rhyme
sadness.author: Eminem

sadness.quote: You have to take responsibility for your own happiness
sadness.author: Reese Witherspoon

sadness.quote: You need to know that part of being strong and tough is having the courage to ask for help when you need it. You must not silently suffer. You are all in this together. And, if I may speak personally, we are all in this together because asking for help was one of the best decisions that I have ever made. You will me continually amazed how life changes for the better
sadness.author: Prince Harry

sadness.quote: One of the best things that helps depression is work, and socialising with other people and connecting. Because when you work you find purpose
sadness.author: Trevor Noah (The Daily Show)

sadness.quote: I was hiding out from the celebrity thing, I was smoking way too much dope. I was sitting on the couch and just turning into a doughnut, and I really got irritated with myself. I got to: ‘What’s the point? I know better than this
sadness.author: Brad Pitt

sadness.quote: Therapy gives you another perspective when you are so lost in your own spiral, it helps
sadness.author: Jon Hamm (Mad Men)

sadness.quote: I’ve suffered through depression and anxiety my entire life. I just want these kids to know that this modern thing, where everyone is feeling shallow and less connected…that’s not human
sadness.author: Lady Gaga

sadness.quote: I don’t feel very much like Pooh today
sadness.author: Winnie the Pooh

sadness.quote: I think the saddest people always try their hardest to make people happy because they know what it’s like to feel absolutely worthless and they don’t want anyone else to feel like that
sadness.author: Robin Williams

sadness.quote: Depression is the most unpleasant thing I have ever experienced… It is that absence of being able to envisage that you will ever be cheerful again. The absence of hope. That very deadened feeling, which is so very different from feeling sad. Sad hurts but it’s a healthy feeling. It is a necessary thing to feel. Depression is very different. J.K
sadness.author: Rowling

sadness.quote: I need one of those long hugs where you kinda forget whatever else is happening around you for minute
sadness.author: Marilyn Monroe

sadness.quote: I’ll never forget how the depression and loneliness felt good and bad at the same time. Still does
sadness.author: Henry Rollins

sadness.quote: People talk about depression all the time. The difference between depression and sadness is sadness is just from happenstance – whatever happened or didn’t happen for you, or grief, or whatever it is. Depression is your body saying f*ck you, I don’t want to be this character anymore, I don’t want to hold up this avatar that you’ve created in the world. It’s too much for me
sadness.author: Jim Carrey

sadness.quote: You can’t stop the future. You can’t rewind the past
sadness.author: Hannah (13 Reasons Why)

sadness.quote: I struggled with anxiety and depression and questioned whether or not I wanted to be alive anymore. It was when I hit this low that I decided to reach out and ask for the help of a licensed therapist. This decision ultimately helped save my life. You don’t have to wait for things
sadness.author: Michael Phelps

sadness.quote: Promise me you’ll always remember: You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think
sadness.author: Winnie the Pooh

sadness.quote: Nothing changes if nothing changes
sadness.author: Mel Robbins

sadness.quote: Breathe
sadness.author: @DailyZen

sadness.quote: There’s always a solution
sadness.author: Noah Kagan

sadness.quote: Reframing is a super power
sadness.author: Rorty Witt

sadness.quote: It won’t always be like this. Halley Cornell (See also: Things That Get Me Through Bad Depression Days, webmd
sadness.author: com)

sadness.quote: I need a break from my own thoughts
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: I’m too tired for long explanations
sadness.author: Haruki Murakami

sadness.quote: Numb the dark and you numb the light
sadness.author: Brené Brown (Daring Greatly)

sadness.quote: Do not stumble on something behind you
sadness.author: Seneca

sadness.quote: Real change requires a desire to change
sadness.author: Gabby Bernstein

sadness.quote: The soul is healed by being with children
sadness.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

sadness.quote: Today’s hot pain is tomorrow’s cold wisdom
sadness.author: The Stoic Emperor

sadness.quote: To heal a wound you must stop scratching it
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho

sadness.quote: All of our miseries are nothing but attachment
sadness.author: Osho

sadness.quote: The greatest griefs are those we cause ourselves
sadness.author: Sophocles

sadness.quote: When you don’t know what you need, you want everything
sadness.author: Thibaut

sadness.quote: The act of releasing your shame is – in itself – healing
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: Admitting you need help with depression or any challenge is strength
sadness.author: Lance Allred

sadness.quote: Only stepping out of old ruts will bring new insights
sadness.author: Andy Grove

sadness.quote: The Universe has your back even when things aren’t working out the way you expected
sadness.author: Gabby Bernstein

sadness.quote: I was blaming instead of taking responsibility. I was taking the easy route that led nowhere instead of taking the hard one that led somewhere
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Even lost and alone, I kept moving forward. Even scared and confused, I kept moving forward. In the end, that’s what you must do: keep moving forward
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge
sadness.author: Eckhart Tolle

sadness.quote: Go to the place inside that hurts. The part that’s lonely or sad. Your broken heart. Your bruised ego. The part of you that worries it will always be this way. Go there now and silently repeat: May you be happy. May you be safe. May you be filled with love. You’re not alone
sadness.author: Jason Garner

sadness.quote: You’re tired. You’re stressed. You’re mentally and physically drained. You feel alone. Struggling with the present, uncertain of the future. Life sucks right now. You’ll be fine. I promise…It gets better. Just keep moving forward
sadness.author: Ralph Napolitano

sadness.quote: Don’t attack your problems. Face them, confess them, understand what they are. That is the process
sadness.author: Iyanla Vanzant

sadness.quote: Nothing has a hold on your mind that you cannot break free of
sadness.author: Iyanla Vanzant

sadness.quote: Nobody else can destroy you except you; nobody else can save you except you
sadness.author: Osho

sadness.quote: Reminder – if you feel chronically depressed – try this before you swallow pills: Sunlight, exercise, clean diet, meditation, 8-9 hours of sleep, human interaction. Daily for 2-3 months. There’s a very high chance your depression will get fixed
sadness.author: @LifeMathMoney

sadness.quote: It’s not too late to recover. You’re young, you’re tough. You’re adaptable. You can patch up your wounds, lift up your head and move on
sadness.author: Haruki Murakami

sadness.quote: You got this. One day at a time. You are resilient, courageous, and capable. Be proud of yourself. It isn’t easy enduring depression/anxiety
sadness.author: The Anxiety Man (@RealAnxietyMan)

sadness.quote: Every day of our lives, we are on the verge of making those slight changes that would make all the difference
sadness.author: Mignon McLaughlin

sadness.quote: We can’t take away the suffering of others. What we can do is show up for them. And in doing so, take away the pain of having to suffer alone
sadness.author: Jason Garner

sadness.quote: Offer whatever light you can
sadness.author: Unknown (Submitted by the Wisdom Quotes Community)

sadness.quote: I’m tired. "Go to sleep then". No, you don’t understand
sadness.author: Unknown

sadness.quote: What not to say to someone with anxiety: quit being dramatic, you need to toughen up, you’re just lazy, when are you going to grow up?, pull yourself together
sadness.author: Try one of these instead: I know this is hard for you, take some time, it’s okay, how can I help? Mental Health Notes

sadness.quote: Please be aware, I am trying my hardest to push through the pain, the exhaustion and fatigue, the brain fog, the insomnia, the fear, the guilt, the judgement, the relentlessness of it all. All the time
sadness.author: Mental Health Notes

sadness.quote: Being depressed, all I needed was someone who could listen to me, believe in me, encourage me, but most of all, understand me
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: How to help people struggling with their mental health: Learn about mental health, go to visit them, give practical support, ask other people to help, listen to them, give them a hug, celebrate their small steps
sadness.author: Mental Health Notes

sadness.quote: Listen. Really, really listen if someone opens up to you about their mental health. A response isn’t always needed, but a compassionate ear is
sadness.author: The Anxiety Man (@RealAnxietyMan)

sadness.quote: If you have a friend going through a crisis, never say "if I can help, let me know." It sounds vague, perfunctory. I try to always say: "please tell me what I can do to help: I want to help you." Friendship is a commitment: always show up in a crisis
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: With the right help, we can understand these problems and we can fix these problems together. But to do that, the very first step is we have to stop insulting these signals by saying they’re a sign of weakness, or madness or purely biological, except for a tiny number of people
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: If you know someone who’s depressed, please resolve never to ask them why. Depression isn’t a straightforward response to a bad situation; depression just is, like the weather
sadness.author: Stephen Fry

sadness.quote: It’s okay to not be okay all the time
sadness.author: Unknown

sadness.quote: If you think you are alone in your problems, you are not alone. There are 7 billion people out there. Someone is going through the same thing
sadness.author: Justin Kan

sadness.quote: Go on that journey to discover who you really are, what you love, what you hate, what’s the content of your mind, why you are the way you are. Take your time. Be curious about your own mind, your fears and your sadness. Meditate and take care of yourself. The more self-knowledge you’ll have, the better you’ll feel, eventually
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: It is very hard to explain to people who have never known serious depression or anxiety the sheer continuous intensity of it. There is no off switch
sadness.author: Matt Haig

sadness.quote: The people who have already walked through the fire can help you do the same. James Clear (30 Famous People with Depression from socialworkdegreeguide
sadness.author: com)

sadness.quote: Many, many men have been just as troubled morally and spiritually as you are right now. Happily, some of them kept records of their troubles. You’ll learn from them – if you want to. J.D
sadness.author: Salinger

sadness.quote: Do not get lost in a sea of despair. Do not become bitter or hostile. Be hopeful, be optimistic
sadness.author: John Lewis

sadness.quote: If you are depressed or anxious – your pain makes sense. You’re not crazy. You’re not broken. There’s scientific evidence for why people feel this way. There’s a mix of causes – biological, psychological and social. None are your fault and all can be dealt with, with love and support
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: No matter how bad things are right now, no matter how stuck you feel, no matter how many days you’ve spent crying and wishing things were different, no matter how hopeless and depressed you feel, I promise you that you won’t feel this way forever. Keep going
sadness.author: Helen Wilson

sadness.quote: This is one more piece of advice I have for you: don’t get impatient. Even if things are so tangled up you can’t do anything, don’t get desperate or blow a fuse and start yanking on one particular thread before it’s ready to come undone. You have to figure it’s going to be a long process and that you’ll work on things slowly, one at a time
sadness.author: Haruki Murakami (Norwegian Wood)

sadness.quote: If you run away from pain without identifying and solving the underlying issue, you will probably run to exactly the same situation again
sadness.author: Justin Kan

sadness.quote: I believe depression is legitimate. But I also believe that if you don’t: exercise, eat nutritious foods, get sunlight, get enough sleep, consume positive material, surround yourself with support, then you aren’t giving yourself a fighting chance
sadness.author: Matt Stephens

sadness.quote: When something is too close to your eyes you cannot see it. For seeing, some distance is needed
sadness.author: Osho

sadness.quote: Love is the most healing force in the world; nothing goes deeper than love. It heals not only the body, not only the mind, but also the soul. If one can love then all one’s wounds disappear. Then one becomes whole – and to be whole is to be holy
sadness.author: Osho

sadness.quote: I was only able to start changing my life when I realized my depression was not a malfunction. It’s a signal. Your depression is a signal. It’s telling you something
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: The scientific evidence is clear that exercise significantly reduces depression and anxiety
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: The more you think life is about money, and status, and how you look to other people, the more vulnerable you are to depression and anxiety. Just like junk food has taken over our diets, junk values have taken over our minds and made us sick
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: It’s okay to worry; it’s okay to be sad. It’s okay to get scared; it’s okay to be mad. It’s okay to embrace our humanity. In fact we don’t have any choice but to be the sensitive, vulnerable creatures we were made to be. Breathe. Let go a bit. It’s okay to be you just as you are
sadness.author: Jason Garner (See also: zen quotes)

sadness.quote: In meditation we learn that sitting is enough. Breathing is enough. This life is enough. And we’re enough too
sadness.author: Jason Garner

sadness.quote: What if we weren’t so hurried to find the answers? What if it was safe to hang out in the unknown? To stumble around in the dark, curious as to what we might find, comfortable in not having it all sorted out
sadness.author: What would we discover about ourselves? About each other? About life? Jason Garner

sadness.quote: If you are being gentle with yourself during a difficult time, that is not self-pity. You would show compassion to a friend in pain, even a stranger, so why withhold it from yourself? Don’t. Keep moving
sadness.author: Maggie Smith

sadness.quote: For anyone struggling or battling through mental and chronic illness, please please remember that you are so brave even though you might not think it. You are literally fighting for your life, fighting through pain and fighting to get through each day, which makes you so fricking strong
sadness.author: Roxxy (@galacticxtears)

sadness.quote: Things to remember: it’s okay to cry, it’s okay to ask for help, you are enough, you matter, bad days happen, you are not alone
sadness.author: Mental Health Notes

sadness.quote: In case no one told you today, you are needed, you are stronger than you think, you are doing great, you deserve the best, you are here for a reason, don’t give up
sadness.author: Mental Health Notes

sadness.quote: Before you diagnose yourself with depression or low self-esteem, first make sure that you are not, in fact, just surrounded by assholes
sadness.author: Sigmund Freud

sadness.quote: Take your M.E.D.S.: MEDITATION – It’s easy to be constantly doing with no time to be. EXERCISE – Our body needs to be stretched. It’s a use it or lose it. DIET – Food for energy which builds and augments rather than destroys. SLEEP – Get the correct amount, feel great
sadness.author: Thibaut

sadness.quote: Some lessons can’t be taught, they simply have to be learned
sadness.author: Jodi Picoult (Vanishing Acts)

sadness.quote: Take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame
sadness.author: Erica Jong

sadness.quote: I am always with myself, and it is I who am my tormentor
sadness.author: Leo Tolstoy

sadness.quote: Being depressed is an opportunity to make a new beginning and to take a new direction. Once you accept the fact that for now, you’re stalled and lost, then you can take the first step
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: You can’t control what happens to you but you can control how you react and the direction you’ll take
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: We’re the middle children of history, man. No purpose or place. We have no Great War. No Great Depression. Our Great War’s a spiritual war… our Great Depression is our lives. We’ve all been raised on television to believe that one day we’d all be millionaires, and movie gods, and rock stars. But we won’t. And we’re slowly learning that fact. And we’re very, very pissed off
sadness.author: Chuck Palahniuk (Fight Club)

sadness.quote: Every thought a person dwells upon, whether he expresses it or not, either damages or improves his life
sadness.author: Lucy Mallory

sadness.quote: Man suffers only because he takes seriously what the gods made for fun
sadness.author: Alan Watts

sadness.quote: Much misery comes from our current self not wanting to betray our past self
sadness.author: Luca Dellanna

sadness.quote: Suffering is an indication of ignorance, but in seeking an escape from suffering you are only nourishing ignorance
sadness.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

sadness.quote: We are always trying to build a bridge between ‘what is’ and ‘what should be’. And in that there is contradiction and conflict
sadness.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

sadness.quote: We are downtrodden by society, by culture, by religions, by priests, by leaders, by saints, and unless you understand this you will never understand fear
sadness.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

sadness.quote: When you’re ready to wake up, you’re going to wake up. And if you’re not ready, you’re going to stay pretending you’re just "poor little me"
sadness.author: Alan Watts

sadness.quote: Most symptoms of depression and anxiety are due to: GMO food, no exercise, sitting all day, disconnect with nature, gossiping, no ambition, lack of sunlight, toxic relationships, victimhood mentality, pleasure seeking. There’s no medication to cure this
sadness.author: Ralph Napolitano

sadness.quote: Stop looking for happiness in the same place you lost it
sadness.author: Paulo Coelho (Hippie)

sadness.quote: There are real brain changes that can happen when you become depressed that can make it harder to get out
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: Many depressed people can only see their pains, and their hurts, and their resentments, and their failures
sadness.author: They can’t see the blue sky and the yellow leaves, you know? Bill Richards

sadness.quote: Depression is more than emotion it’s: trouble concentrating and making decisions, constant negative thoughts, fatigue and body aches, irritability and restlessness, feeling empty, loss of interest in everything
sadness.author: Mental Health Notes

sadness.quote: Man is sometimes extraordinarily, passionately, in love with suffering
sadness.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

sadness.quote: Suffering is not holding you; you are holding suffering
sadness.author: Osho

sadness.quote: Frustrations come because we impose our illusions on reality
sadness.author: Osho

sadness.quote: In the flame of awareness all problems are finally resolved
sadness.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

sadness.quote: Despair can never be dissolved through escape, but by observing it
sadness.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

sadness.quote: Depression is a gift. The only inconvenient is that you need to wait a few weeks, and sometimes a few years, to appreciate it. Be patient
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Ordinarily we do not discover the wisdom of our feelings because we do not let them complete their work. We try to suppress them or discharge them in premature action. Not realizing that they are a process of creation which, like birth, begins as a pain and turns into a child
sadness.author: Alan Watts

sadness.quote: We must abandon completely the notion of blaming the past for any kind of situation we’re in
sadness.author: Alan Watts

sadness.quote: The greatest wisdom lies on the other side, immediately on the other side, of the greatest despair
sadness.author: Alan Watts

sadness.quote: Buddha’s doctrine: man suffers because of his craving to possess and keep forever things which are impermanent
sadness.author: Alan Watts

sadness.quote: If you are depressed, you live in the past. If you are anxious, you live in the future. But if you are at peace, you live in the present
sadness.author: Lao Tzu

sadness.quote: Life will give you whatever experience is the most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. How do you know this is the experience you need? Because this is the experience you are having at this moment
sadness.author: Eckhart Tolle

sadness.quote: The faster you accept reality, the faster you find peace of mind
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Our wounds need nurturing care in order to heal. If we are to nurture and heal, we must admit that the wounds exist
sadness.author: Iyanla Vanzant

sadness.quote: Meditation can and will order your thinking and therefore your mind. As we heal the wounded places in our minds, we grow
sadness.author: Iyanla Vanzant

sadness.quote: Resistance to unwanted circumstances has the power to keep those circumstances alive and well for a very long time
sadness.author: Pema Chödrön

sadness.quote: Difficult events occur for our spiritual growth. These aren’t meant to be punishment. Beautiful sunset awaits after heavy rain
sadness.author: Haemin Sunim

sadness.quote: When you do not get to the root of the problem, you cannot solve it in any meaningful manner
sadness.author: Robert Greene

sadness.quote: Not all storms come to disturb your life. Some come to clear your path
sadness.author: Unknown

sadness.quote: Stop texting, start listening
sadness.author: Lisa Ling

sadness.quote: Comparing yourself to others is a guaranteed prescription for misery
sadness.author: Shane Parrish

sadness.quote: To anyone feeling depressed and anxious: Fastest way to feel better is to get offline. @orangebook_ (on twitter
sadness.author: com)

sadness.quote: No amount of social media will replace a hug, an handshake and a real look in the eyes
sadness.author: Maxime Lagacé

sadness.quote: Put down your phone. Talk to someone face to face. We are all kinder out here in the meat-world
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: The scrutiny that young people face on social media can lead to anxiety, depression, and even suicidal thoughts
sadness.author: Lady Gaga

sadness.quote: Why are depression and anxiety on the rise? Because modern society is designed to make you anxious and depressed. Garbage food, sedentary lifestyle, cubicle work, social media, toxic politics, hookup culture, loss of religion, decline of family, drugs, consumerism
sadness.author: Zuby

sadness.quote: The Internet was born into a world where many people had already lost their sense of connection to each other. The collapse had already been taking place for decades by then. The web arrived offering them a kind of parody of what they were losing – Facebook friends in place of neighbors, video games in place of meaningful work, status updates in place of status in the world
sadness.author: Johann Hari (Lost Connections)

sadness.quote: Facebook is virtual prison which keeps dead relationships alive forever
sadness.author: Thibaut

sadness.quote: I am your addiction. Your time is mine. I control you. You need me. I define you. You belong to me. -Social Media
sadness.author: Thibaut

sadness.quote: The rise of social media is proving problematic. Younger age groups of children and adults are now becoming heavily absorbed in it, unaware that social media presents rose-tinted versions of life as the truth, and it’s against this fiction that they’re comparing themselves
sadness.author: Thibaut

sadness.quote: We have a whole range of devices and apps designed to be addictive. Build mental firewalls so that you can focus on what’s important. Learn to control environmental stimuli. Don’t lose the attention war
sadness.author: Thibaut

sadness.quote: Since time began people: Got married, ate meat, raised families, spoke face to face, confronted issues. For 60 years people have: Had casual relationships, ate fried carbs, lived alone, spoke through screens, buried problems. A millennia of behaviours cant be wrong
sadness.author: Jack Peach

sadness.quote: As kids become more depressed and anxious, limiting screen time is not enough. Kids need less homework and fewer tests, longer recesses and lunches, more socioemotional learning, more unstructured, unscheduled time to play
sadness.author: Adam Grant

sadness.quote: Toxins consumed by people on a daily basis: sugar, vegetable oils, TV, excessive/indiscriminate social media, "socialization", hurriedness, political and celebrity gossip, news, "friends", social approval/validation
sadness.author: The Ancient Sage

sadness.quote: One lesson from the success of podcasts and YouTube: there is an enormous market for digital companionship. We are profoundly social creatures. Modern life can be lonely. We miss the chatter of the ancestral campfire. We import voices to fill the silence and feel less isolated
sadness.author: The Stoic Emperor

sadness.quote: When you access social media, email, or the news, you enable the voices of all of humanity to compete to set your agenda. These voices take up significant mental real estate. They make it hard to hear your own thinking. Be vigilant about guarding your own cognitive resources
sadness.author: The Stoic Emperor

sadness.quote: Modern tech and media tempt us to spend our lives reacting to things we can’t change. Obsessing over far-off dramas, ignoring the decline close to home. Smartphones offer 24/7 access to on demand anxiety. Make your tools serve you. Don’t serve them. Act more. React less
sadness.author: The Stoic Emperor

sadness.quote: People worry constantly about their place in their tribe. They find it hard enough to manage the opinions of a few friends and family. Managing the visible opinions of thousands? Impossible. Social media made everyone a micro celebrity and sent "social anxiety" through the roof
sadness.author: The Stoic Emperor

sadness.quote: Part 1. Mobile phones should be called distraction machines. Checking your distraction machine first thing in the morning is not the ideal way to start your day
sadness.author: Muneeb

sadness.quote: Part 2. Entertainment hubs masquerading as productivity devices – the perfect combo
sadness.author: Naval Ravikant

sadness.quote: The comedian Marc Maron once wrote that "every status update is a just a variation on a single request: ‘Would someone please acknowledge me?"
sadness.author: Johann Hari (Lost Connections)

sadness.quote: When they talk among themselves, advertising people have been admitting since the 1920s that their job is to make people feel inadequate – and then offer their product as the solution to the sense of inadequacy they have created
sadness.author: Johann Hari (Lost Connections)

sadness.quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society
sadness.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

sadness.quote: This pain you are feeling is not a pathology. It’s not crazy. It is a signal that your natural psychological needs are not being met. It is a form of grief – for yourself, and for the culture you live in going so wrong. I know how much it hurts. I know how deeply it cuts you. But you need to listen to this signal. We all need to listen to the people around us sending out this signal. It is telling you what is going wrong. It is telling you that you need to be connected in so many deep and stirring ways that you aren’t yet – but you can be, one day
sadness.author: Johann Hari

sadness.quote: The word ‘depressed’ can be spoken as DEEP REST. We can choose to view depression, not as a mental illness but as a state of Deep Rest, a spiritual exhaustion that we enter into when we are depressed (pressed down) by the weight of the false self, the mask, the mind-made story of "me". We long to stop pretending, and express our raw truth! To give voice to our secret loneliness, our shame, our broken hearts, boredom, and brilliant rage! Depression’s call to truth needs to be listened to and understood, not analyzed or medicated away. There is no shame in your exhaustion. We are all exhausted, my love. Slow down today. Allow yourself to rest, deeply. And weep. And breathe. And begin again. Now. I say, our depression is holy. It contains the seeds of new life
sadness.author: Jeff Foster

sadness.quote: Find meaning. Distinguish melancholy from sadness. Go out for a walk. It doesn’t have to be a romantic walk in the park, spring at its most spectacular moment, flowers and smells and outstanding poetical imagery smoothly transferring you into another world. It doesn’t have to be a walk during which you’ll have multiple life epiphanies and discover meanings no other brain ever managed to encounter. Do not be afraid of spending quality time by yourself. Find meaning or don’t find meaning but ‘steal’ some time and give it freely and exclusively to your own self. Opt for privacy and solitude. That doesn’t make you antisocial or cause you to reject the rest of the world. But you need to breathe. And you need to be
sadness.author: Albert Camus
